Line 1: Line 1:   +
{{sources}}
'''Ildibad''' (Sometimes rendered '''Hildebad''' or '''Heldebadus''') (died 541) was a king of the [[Ostrogoth]]s in [[Italy]], being chosen to replace [[Witiges]], who had been engaged in complicated schemes with [[Belisarius]] and had left [[Ravenna]]. Ildibald reigned for only about a year before being killed by a [[Gepid]] at a palace banquet. After a brief interlude under [[Eraric]], he was succeeded by his nephew [[Totila]].
'''Ildibad''' (Sometimes rendered '''Hildebad''' or '''Heldebadus''') (died 541) was a king of the [[Ostrogoth]]s in [[Italy]], being chosen to replace [[Witiges]], who had been engaged in complicated schemes with [[Belisarius]] and had left [[Ravenna]]. Ildibald reigned for only about a year before being killed by a [[Gepid]] at a palace banquet. After a brief interlude under [[Eraric]], he was succeeded by his nephew [[Totila]].
